meanings.definition: Make a series of quick, high-pitched sounds, as a bird or squirrel.
meanings.sent1: The birds chittered happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I heard the squirrels chittering in the park.
meanings.sent3: The chittering birds added a cheerful melody to the morning.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter chittered through the room like a flock of birds taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The chittering of the squirrels was like a lively conversation among friends.

meanings.definition: A series of quick, high-pitched sounds, as a bird or squirrel.
meanings.sent1: The chitter of the birds filled the forest with music.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the distant chitter of squirrels in the park.
meanings.sent3: The constant chitter of the birds became the soundtrack of the day.
meanings.sent4: The chitter of the birds was a symphony of nature's own making.
meanings.sent5: The sudden chitter of the squirrel made me jump with surprise.
